nodes.text: Hermione "Harmony" Bagwa was a female human who worked as a waitress at Dex's Diner, an eatery owned by Dexter Jettster and located on the streets of CoCo Town, Coruscant. She grew up within Coruscant's underworld. Shortly before the onset of the Clone Wars, Bagwa was present in the diner when Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi visited Jettster regarding a mysterious saberdart.
Hermione Bagwa was portrayed by Australian actress Susie Porter in Attack of the Clones.
